A

AbstractCommonBorder - class com.incors.plaf.AbstractCommonBorder.
Abstract superclass for all common borders that are provided by a look and feel.

AlloyCommonBorderFactory - class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyCommonBorderFactory.
This class provides static methods for creating various borders that match the Alloy Look&Feel.
AlloyCommonBorderFactory() - Constructor for class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyCommonBorderFactory
 
AlloyCommonUtilities - class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyCommonUtilities.
The class AlloyCommonUtilities provides static method to support some functionality that can be used by developers when working with the Alloy Look&Feel.
AlloyCommonUtilities() - Constructor for class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyCommonUtilities
 
AlloyFontTheme - interface com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyFontTheme.
An AlloyFontTheme provides the fonts that are used to display text on swing components.
AlloyLookAndFeel - class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyLookAndFeel.
Implements the Alloy Look&Feel.
AlloyLookAndFeel() - Constructor for class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyLookAndFeel
Creates a new instance of AlloyLookAndFeel.
AlloyLookAndFeel(AlloyTheme) - Constructor for class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyLookAndFeel
Creates a new instance of AlloyLookAndFeel that uses the specified AlloyTheme as its theme.

I

initClassDefaults(UIDefaults) - Method in class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyLookAndFeel
Creates the mappings from UI class IDs to ComponentUI classes and puts the ID-ComponentUI pairs into the specified defaults table.
initComponentDefaults(UIDefaults) - Method in class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyLookAndFeel
Creates the mappings from component defaults to the default values of the Alloy Look&Feel and the current theme and puts them into the specified defaults table.
initSystemColorDefaults(UIDefaults) - Method in class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyLookAndFeel
Creates the mappings from system color names to thecolors of the current theme and puts them into the specifed defaults table.
isNativeLookAndFeel() - Method in class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyLookAndFeel
Always returns false, because the Alloy Look&Feel is not a native look and feel.
isSupportedLookAndFeel() - Method in class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyLookAndFeel
Always returns true, because the Alloy Look&Feel is supported on all platforms.

S

set3DBackground(AbstractButton, Color) - Static method in class com.incors.plaf.alloy.AlloyCommonUtilities
This method sets the background of the specified abstract button to the specified color and makes the button paint the background with a slight 3D effect.
